manifest.title: Manifest Reference
manifest.subtitle: Complete reference for the extension manifest.json file structure and all available fields.

fields.name: Unique identifier for your extension (lowercase, alphanumeric, hyphens)
fields.publicKey: Ed25519 public key (64 hex characters, generated by haex init)
fields.author: Author name displayed in the marketplace
fields.homepage: URL to your extension's homepage or repository
fields.entry: HTML entry point relative to the build output
fields.icon: Path to the extension icon (relative to haextension folder)
fields.displayMode: How the extension displays in haex-vault
fields.singleInstance: If true, only one instance can run at a time

displayModes.auto: Automatically choose the best display mode based on context
displayModes.window: Display as a separate window with native window controls
displayModes.iframe: Display as an embedded iframe within haex-vault
